title: AFORS-HET-based numerical exploration of tunnel oxide passivated contact solar cells incorporating n- and p-type silicon substrates
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22253-22265
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03286A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rabia Saeed, Sofia Tahir, Adnan Ali, Hind Albalawi, Arslan Ashfaq
The development of a tunnel oxide interfacial layer capped by a highly doped poly-Si layer is considered one of the most promising methods to reduce charge carrier recombination and improve the performance of conventional PERC devices.
